components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,POWER TRAIN,EQUIPMENT
summary: AT 15,000 MILES I HAD A PISTON KNOCK DEVELOP. PISTONS WERE REPLACED AND WAS TOLD THIS WAS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THIS ENGINE.  GAS CAP SEAL BAD AT SAME TIME.  DECK LID NOT PROPERLY ADJUSTED AT TIME OF PURCHASE.  AT 25,000 THE REAR LEFT SPEAKER WAS REPLACED DUE NOT WORKING AND THE TORQUE CLUTCH CONVERTER WAS COMING APART AND STUCK IN THE OFF POSITION.  FIRST PROBLEM WAS NOTED IN 2002.*JB
